Html: I can't find it in the doc or samples or even on the discussions.  Can someone tell me what method to use to check if the task exists already?
Use the TaskService.GetTask method. You can find an example in the Documention in both the simple and complex examples.

dahall:

Thank you for your response.  I found out that if I just tell the app to keep doing it (like creating a new one) it just overwrites what is already there which is fine in my case.  Thanks for your help!
